snippet: First Solar and Florida-based NextEra Energy Resources have started construction on a $1 billion, 250-megawatt solar power generating station in the desert 50 miles south of Las Vegas.
abstract: Energy companies First Solar and NextEra Energy Resources are partnering with federal Bureau of Land Management to build $1 billion, 250-megawatt solar power generating station in the desert 50 miles south of Las Vegas; plant is expected to produce enough electricity to power 80,000 California homes by its 2016 completion.
lead_paragraph: First Solar and Florida-based NextEra Energy Resources have started construction on a $1 billion, 250-megawatt solar power generating station in the desert 50 miles south of Las Vegas.

headline.main: Construction Starts on a Solar Plant
headline.print_headline: Construction Starts on a Solar Plant
